alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 10:22AM CDT until April 10 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 66.0 feet, farm and pasturelands in the area will flood and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 66.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CDT Saturday was 66.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 46.9 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
